database.name: Ifla, Burning Inventor
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Lvl 1]
passive_abilities: Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste attacks an opponent, before damage calculation: You may select a unit an enemy controls and if you do, deal 10 damage to it.

active_abilities.name: Bursting Fire
active_abilities.description: Select an allied unit and if you do, deal 10 damage to it.

database.name: Ifla, Flaming Architect
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Lvl 2]
passive_abilities: Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste attacks an opponent, before damage calculation: You may select a unit an enemy controls and if you do, deal 10 damage to it.

active_abilities.description: Select an allied unit and if you do, grant it Haste.

database.name: Ifla, Eden's Architect
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Lvl 3]
passive_abilities: Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste declares an attack: Create an attacking (30/30) 'Fragile Machine' token with Haste.

leader_attacks.description: You may select up to two enemy units and if you do, deal 20 damage to the selected units.

database.name: Ifla, The World Architect
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Architect/Legend/Lvl 4]
passive_abilities: Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste declares an attack: Create attacking (30/30) 'Fragile Machine' tokens with Haste equal to your opponents Life Cloth total left.

leader_attacks.description: You may select up to two enemy units and if you do, deal 30 damage to the selected units.

database.name: Dragon Knight of Hythe
database.description: [Dragon/Knight/Legend]When this unit deals combat damage to a player, deal 30 damage to every unit which is controlled by them. If this unit has Haste, Field Spells cannot be targetted by card effects, but destroy all Field Spells if this unit dies. Heal this unit by 8 when your turn ends.

database.name: Storm Valley
database.description: [Field]Units you control have Haste. Once per turn, when you activate a spell or an ability which deals non-combat damage to a unit or player, you may decrease the Waiting Time of one of your units by 1.

database.name: Blazing Magic Enhancer
database.description: [Magician]Units with Haste you control gain (+10/+10).

database.description: [Architect]

database.name: Priest of the Living Light
database.description: [Cleric]When this unit enters the battlefield, you may choose another of your units. Select it and then heal it completely if it took damage, else deal 10 damage to it and grant it Haste. You may sacrifice this unit to grant another of your units Haste.

database.description: [Animal]Once per turn, if this unit has Haste, you may discard your entire Hand to draw 2 cards.

database.name: Jadetwirl Revolutionary
database.description: [Architect]Once per turn, when a token would be created by one of your cards, you may create two of those tokens instead.

database.name: Cirrane Underground Fighter
database.description: [Fighter]Once per turn, if this is the only unit attacking this turn, give this unit (+10/+10) for every unit and leader with Haste you control until the end of your turn.

database.name: Nimble Squirrel
database.description: [Animal]Flash. If this unit is flash summoned: You may select an enemy unit. If the selected unit attacks this turn, the damage it deals is dealt to this card instead.

database.name: Lance and Spear - TAG TEAM
database.description: [Fighter/TAG TEAM]If this unit is summoned to occupy a vertical space: It gains Haste. If this unit is summoned to occupy a horizontal space: This unit gains (+0/+40).

database.name: Blaze Constructor
database.description: [Architect]Once per turn, you may sacrifice an allied unit. If you do, select an enemy unit and deal damage equal to the sacrificed unit's remaining HP to it.

database.name: Meteor Mage
database.description: [Magician]Once per turn, if this unit has Haste and target opponent has Life Cloth left, you may sacrifice this unit to deal 10 damage to target opponent.

database.name: Rebuilder of Ruins
database.description: [Architect]Once per turn, if this unit has Haste, you may choose a number between 1 and 3 and select an opponent. Target opponent and you discard the selected amount of cards. For each card with cost 4 or less, deal 3 damage to every unit.

database.name: Hurry up!
database.description: Target allied unit gains Haste until the end of this turn. If it has been summoned this turn, reduce its Waiting Time to 0.

database.name: Metal Enhancement Mk I
database.description: Equip an allied unit. It gains (+20/+20). On your next Standby Phase, you may sacrifice the equipped unit and if you do, you may add a 'Metal Enhancement Mk II' from your Deck to your Hand.

database.name: Metal Enhancement Mk II
database.description: Equip an allied unit. It gains (+30/+30). On your next Standby Phase, you may sacrifice the equipped unit and if you do, select an enemy unit and deal damage equal to the equipped unit's STR to it.

database.name: The final battle
database.description: Double all of your unit's and leader's STR until the end of your turn. At the end of your turn, destroy all allied units, then you take damage equal to the amount of units destroyed by this effect x 10.

database.name: Meteor Shower
database.description: Select all units individually and if you do, destroy the selected units.

database.name: Unfair Advantage
database.description: Select an attacking allied unit which is blocked by an enemy unit. Destroy the blocking unit. The attack is calculated as if there was no blocker and ignores your opponent's Life Cloth. (Your opponent takes direct damage.)

database.description: Select a unit. Deal damage to all units equal to the selected unit's STR.

database.description: Reduce a unit's Waiting Time to 0.

database.description: The next time target opponent takes damage, double that damage.

leader_attacks.description: Select a unit an opponent controls. Increase it's Waiting Time by 1, but it can still block (even if its' Waiting Time is increased again).

When the selected unit's Waiting Time is reduced to 0, destroy this unit. Once per turn, when this unit deals combat damage to a player: You may sacrifice this unit and if you do, select a unit and increase its Waiting Time by 2.

database.name: Dream Accelerator
database.description: [Dream Creature]When this unit enters the battlefield, select an allied unit. Increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by 2. When the selected unit's Waiting Time is reduced to 0, destroy this unit. Once per turn, if this unit has no Waiting Time: You may select an allied unit and decrease its Waiting Time by 1.

database.description: [Cleric]Once per turn, when one of your card effects increase a unit's Waiting Time: You may half the Waiting Time added by the effect.

database.name: Dream Giant

If this unit is summoned to occupy a horizontal space: Increase the Waiting Time of all enemy units by 2.

database.name: Nightmare Scarecrow

Then, if you activated this effect, increase all enemy units Waiting Time by 3.

database.description: Select a unit and increase its Waiting Time by 1.

Once per turn, when one of your effects increases the Waiting Time of a unit, you may pay 2 and if you do, you may search your Deck for up to 1 purple Magic with a level equal or less the level of your Leader and add it to your Hand.

database.name: Dream Transfer
database.description: Select a unit and reduce its Waiting Time to 0. If you do, you may select an enemy unit and if you do, increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by the amount of Waiting Time removed by this effect.

database.name: Dream Ritual
database.description: Increase the Waiting Time of all units by 2. Then, you may summon a purple unit from your Deck with cost equal or less the amount of units with an active Waiting Time.

database.name: The Other Side
database.description: Until the end of this turn, play with the top card of your deck revealed. You may play the revealed card by paying its' cost, -1.

database.description: Search your deck for purple cards up to the number of units with an active Waiting Time, with cost up to the combined half of Waiting Time of allied units.

database.name: Mark of Time
database.description: The next time one of target opponent unit's Waiting Time being increased, double that Waiting Time.

database.description: [Animal]When this unit enters the battlefield: Select up to one enemy unit and if you do, grant it (-1/0).

database.name: Undead Servant
database.description: [Undead]Gravewalker 5. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its Gravewalker Cost. You may only activate one Gravewalker per turn.) Once per turn, when this card is sent to the Graveyard: You may select up to one enemy unit and reduce its STR to 0 until the end of this turn.

database.name: Lost Angel
database.description: [Angel]

database.name: Graveyard Cat
database.description: [Animal]When this card is sent to the Graveyard and at least one more unit is sent to the Graveyard this turn, draw 1 card in your Extension Phase.

database.name: Brawler Zombie
database.description: [Undead/Fighter]Gravewalker 6. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its Gravewalker Cost. You may only activate one Gravewalker per turn.)

database.name: Vengeful Major
database.description: [Undead]If this card is summoned from your Graveyard: You may select up to one enemy card and destroy it.

database.name: Angel of Peace
database.description: [Fallen/Angel]Gravewalker 10. If this card is summoned from your Graveyard: Your opponent cannot attack in his next turn.

database.name: Fallen of Loss
database.description: [Fallen]Once per turn, you may discard a card and if you do, your opponent discards a card.

database.name: Angel of Exchange
database.description: [Fallen/Angel]Once per turn, you may pay 5 and sacrifice this unit and if you do, add a card from your Graveyard back to your Hand. You can not cast it this turn.

database.name: Rotting Wolf
database.description: [Animal]First Strike. When this card is sent to the Graveyard: Select up to two enemy units and half their STR until the end of this turn.

database.name: Leech Monster
database.description: [Undead/Animal]Gravewalker 8. If this card is summoned from your Graveyard: Your opponent discards 2 cards. When this card is summoned: Draw 1 card for each unit which has less STR than its original STR.

database.name: Fallen of Fatigue
database.description: [Fallen](Quick)You may pay 3 and if you do, select up to 3 enemy units and reduce their STR to 0 until the end of this turn.

database.name: Angel of Protection
database.description: [Angel]Flash. When this unit is summoned, you may select an enemy unit and if you do, the selected unit cannot deal combat damage until the end of this turn and its effects are negated until the end of this turn. The turn this card is summoned, it can block up to 2 enemy attackers.

database.name: Fallen Mentor and Angel Student - TAG TEAM
database.description: [Fallen/Angel/TAG TEAM]If this unit is summoned to occupy a vertical space: When you discard a card, this card gains (+1/+1) until the end of this turn. If this unit is summoned to occupy a horizontal space: Once per turn, you may cast an additional Gravewalker from your Graveyard this turn by paying its Gravewalker Cost, but if you do, you cannot attack this turn. (If you already attacked, you cannot use this effect.)

database.name: Sleeping Giant
database.description: [Undead]Gravewalker 9.

database.name: Fallen of Life
database.description: [Fallen]Once per turn, you may discard your entire Hand and if you do, this unit gains (-1/0) for each card discarded this way, also draw 1 card for each 2 cards discarded.

database.name: Angel of Death
database.description: [Fallen/Angel/Legend]You may cast up to 3 Gravewalkers from your Graveyard each turn. All units without Gravewalk in your Graveyard gain Gravewalk X, where X is their Cost. When a unit with Gravewalk is summoned from your Graveyard, you may select up to one card an opponent controls and banish it.

database.name: Decay
database.description: Discard 1 card.

database.name: Curse
database.description: Sacrifice one of your units and select an enemy unit: Decrease the selected unit's STR by the STR of the sacrificed unit and deal damage to the selected unit equal to the HP of the sacrificed unit.

database.name: Impede
database.description: Give a unit (-2/0) until the end of this turn.

database.name: Raise Undead
database.description: Select a unit in your Graveyard. Grant it Gravewalker X, where X is the unit's Cost +3. The selected unit is an Undead next to its other types.

database.name: Group Penalty
database.description: Every player sacrifices a controlled unit. If a player cannot sacrifice a creature, they discard the unit with the highest STR in their 10 cards from the top of their Deck. If its a tie, you may decide the discarded creature. If there is no unit available, you may discard any other card from the 10 cards instead.

database.name: Graveyard
database.description: [Field]Your Gravewalker Costs are reduced by 1. Once per turn, you may cast an additional Gravewalker. Once per turn, when a Gravewalker is activated: You may select an enemy unit and if you do, give it (-X/0) until the end of this turn, where X is the Gravewalker unit's STR.

database.name: Necromancy
database.description: Select 2 black Magic from your Graveyard. You may cast them this turn by banishing cards from your Graveyard equal to the selected cards' Cost.

database.name: Attack of the Living Dead
database.description: Cast as many units from your Graveyard as possible, but their effects are negated. They have Haste, die at the end of this turn and are Undeads instead of their types. Until the end of the game, cards sent to your Graveyard are banished instead.
